description: A classic Flappy Bird game built with HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript

controls.start: Click Start Game button or press SPACE
controls.restart: Click Restart button or Play Again after game over

features: Smooth bird physics with gravity and rotation
Randomly generated pipes with varying gaps
Score tracking with local storage for best score
Collision detection and game over handling
Multiple theme options with different color schemes

themes.sunset: Warm orange and red sunset theme
